data.comment: Erik Lambrechts starts the match. Anderlecht with the kick-off in Bruges.
Krepin Diatta puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Erik Lambrechts blows to start the second-half. Brugge with the kick-off.
Francis Amuzu is on a sub for Zakaria Bakkali for Anderlecht.
In the minute 46, Timon Wellenreuther is replacing Hendrik Van Crombrugge for Anderlecht at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Brugge have been given a penalty...
At Jan Breydel Stadium, Albert Sambi Lokonga has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 48, Goal! Hans Vanaken extends Brugge's lead from the spot. They now lead 2-0.
Derrick Luckassen for Anderlecht has been booked by Erik Lambrechts and receives a first yellow card.
Brugge's Mats Rits has been booked in Bruges.
In the minute 72, Albert Sambi Lokonga (Anderlecht) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a first substitution, with Emmanuel Dennis replacing Youssouph Badji.
Kristian Arnstad (Anderlecht) has received a yellow card from Erik Lambrechts.
In the minute 86, Brugge make their second substitution with Siebe Schrijvers replacing Hans Vanaken.
Philippe Clement is making the team's third substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with David Okereke replacing Krepin Diatta.
The away team replace Yari Verschaeren with Marco Kana.
The match has come to a close in Bruges. The final score is 3-0.
Goal! Ruud Vormer extends Brugge's lead to 3-0.
